settings.title: Welcome to healf plus
settings.content: Unlock a world of wellness with healf plus - where ease meets everyday healthy living. Experience seamless access to the finest health brands, unlimited free next day delivery, personalised guidance & exclusive benefits that simplify your path to a healthier you.
settings.short_text: Benefits will automatically apply once membership is added to cart.

settings.title: Exclusive access to discounts and product launches
Go anywhere, do anything.   We will handle the rest.
settings.description: The exclusive benefits for healf plus members:

settings.title: With healf plus, your life is back in reach.
settings.content: We created healf plus to make it as easy as possible for you have your foundation of healf covered. Get everything you need all in one place at any time with professional advice and save money on every order.
settings.short_text: Benefits will automatically apply once membership is added to cart.

settings.title: Personal wellness advisor
settings.content: Members will receive their wellness advisors email and Whatsapp which they are free to message whenever they please. Responses are guaranteed in less than 24 hours.

settings.title: Unlimited next day delivery
settings.content: Unlimited Next-Day Delivery to UK addresses on all items is included at no extra cost. Depending on when you place your order, your delivery address, and available stock, it ships that same day and arrives the next day. Cut off time midday.

settings.title: How much does it cost?
settings.content: healf plus members pay £4.99 for the service per calendar month. Your payment details will be stored securely and you'll be charged on a monthly basis. The membership auto-renews at the end of each month, and if you don't want to renew your membership you can cancel it at any time.

settings.title: Exclusive access to discounts and product launches
settings.content: As a healf plus member you will receive by email exclusive access to discounts and product launches on our top brands.

settings.title: Discovery
settings.description: We do the work for you finding the best healthy living brands across the globe.

settings.title: Testing
settings.description: Our community tests every healthy living product. We know real people have seen real impacts.

settings.title: Validation
settings.description: Every single one of our self care products for healthy living is endorsed by a panel of leading industry experts.

settings.text: Get the latest updates and exclusive content delivered straight to your inbox with our newsletter!
